version_description: Fixed a bug in the Turkish version, that was preventing typing any word starting with a 4-3 combination. This was due to iOS incorrectly changing case of the Turkish " İ ".
Fixed a bug in the Turkish version, that was preventing typing any word starting with a 4-3 combination. This was due to iOS incorrectly changing case of the Turkish " İ ".
Fixed a bug in the Turkish version, that was preventing typing any word starting with a 4-3 combination. This was due to iOS incorrectly changing case of the Turkish " İ ".
Fixed a bug in the Turkish version, that was preventing typing any word starting with a 4-3 combination. This was due to iOS incorrectly changing case of the Turkish " İ ".

It’s been over a year in the making - version 2.0 is here.
Type Nine is now 8x faster than before.
A new and thoroughly tested layout brings a much better typing experience and new features such as swiping, automatic language selection, and much more.

I am certain the new improved layout is worth getting used to.
After spending a few days with it, you'll feel right at home.

Be sure to check out the tutorials to discover the new features and get an idea of what has changed.
Happy Typing.

VoiceOver enhancements.
- Three finger swipe down for next word
- Three finger swipe up for previous word
- Three finger swipe left to delete entire word
- Three finger swipe right to insert period and space
- Magic tap to toggle manual mode
- Speak letters of buttons after the number eg. 2 A B C
- Fix number toggling button state
- Speak current word after each letter insertion
- Fix speaking state of menu buttons - manual, sound & sound
